project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project, carried out over the four years 1976-1978, would comprise: (a) implementation of a four-year program of periodic maintenance, including procurement of equipment and training of specialized DPW staff at all levels; (b) construction and improvement of the roads Zinder-Nigerian border (about 113 km), and Maradi-Nigerian border (Djibiya) (about 49 km); and (c) consulting services for: (i) technical assistance required under item (a) above; (ii) supervision of road construction; and (iii) a survey of the domestic construction industry.
